column5: Will be fishing Lac Suel next week near Ear Falls. We will be crossing the border either at Fort Frances or Baudette. Was wondering where is a good place to buy leeches on the way and if anyone knew about prices. Thanks a bunch.

Was in canada last year and if your going to a lodge they'll have all the bait there you want, other wise there are always bait shops near by, unless your going in on a fly-in then there's bait right there from where you fly out of usually,price wise cant help yea there, later
